solution_line_template: The number of males in the party was {male_fraction} * {total_guests} guests = <<{male_fraction}*{total_guests}={num_males}>>{num_males} males
If the total number of people at the party was {total_guests}, then there were {total_guests} guests - {num_males} males = <<{total_guests}-{num_males}={num_females}>>{num_females} females.
